'''''Amon Hen'' 296''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-sixth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in August [[2022]].

==Contents==
*Front cover:  Her Gaze by Fabio Leone
*'''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
*'''4''' - A Comparison between Entish Calls and ‘Kulning’ by Sebastián Alejandro Freigeiro
*'''8''' - Book Review: Medieval Contexts in Modern Fantasy Fiction: J.R.R. Tolkien and George R.R. Martin by Lynn Forest-Hill
*'''10''' - When Tolkien Met Gamgee by Christian Kriticos
*'''12''' - Bringing Distant Reading to Tolkien and Other Works of Fantasy by Christina Nguyen
*'''15''' - A Tale Of Two Tales: Lord Of The Rings And Dune Considered by Casey Telling
*'''18''' - Centerfold: Ring-verse by [[Ralph Damiani]]
*'''20''' - Boromir: Beyond His Borders by Gretchen Lorenzen
*'''25''' - Did Tolkien Know About Talbot House? by Bertin Deneire
*'''28''' - Poem: Beren and Luthien by Eryn Go
*'''30''' - Behind Glass Doors
*'''32''' - Mathom
*'''34''' - News From Fangorn
*Back cover: Arwen by Zane Libiete
